greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n/A125746(n), where A125746(n) gives the smallest divisor d of n such that the sum which includes d and all smaller divisors is >= n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: (PARI) A300826(n) = { my(k=0,s=0); fordiv(n,d, k++; s += d; if(s>=n,return(n/d))); };
xref: Cf. A005100 (positions of ones), A023196 (positions of terms > 1).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 21 2018
